collection:
This page is used to inform our users regarding my policies with
collection, use and disclosure of any personal information if anyone decides
to use our services.

Any information collected it used for providing and
improving the service.

#### Information Collection

For a better experience, while using our service we may collect some data
through the use of Google Analytics which will allow us to see the number of
people visiting our site.

The Google Analytics policy can be found here -
https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en-US The API will also collect your IP
address, this is purely to allow us to use rate limiting and will not be
shared with any third parties.

#### Log Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use our services we log your visits.

This data may include information such as your IP address, and in some cases
location data based off of this IP address.

However, the website may use third
party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve
their services.

I do not knowingly
collect personally identifiable information from children under 13.
